description: Changes the list of users that belong to the user group.

parameters.name: UserGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the user group.

parameters.name: UserIdsToAdd
parameters.description: The list of user IDs to add to the user group. (string) ---

parameters.name: UserIdsToRemove
parameters.description: The list of user IDs to remove from the user group. (string) ---

nested_items.name: UserGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the user group.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates user group status. Can be 'creating', 'active', 'modifying', 'deleting'.

nested_items.name: Engine
nested_items.description: The options are valkey or redis.

nested_items.name: UserIds
nested_items.description: The list of user IDs that belong to the user group.

nested_items.name: MinimumEngineVersion
nested_items.description: The minimum engine version required, which is Redis OSS 6.0

nested_items.name: PendingChanges
nested_items.description: A list of updates being applied to the user group.

nested_items.name: UserIdsToRemove
nested_items.description: The list of user IDs to remove.

nested_items.name: UserIdsToAdd
nested_items.description: The list of user IDs to add.

nested_items.name: ReplicationGroups
nested_items.description: A list of replication groups that the user group can access.

nested_items.name: ServerlessCaches
nested_items.description: Indicates which serverless caches the specified user group is associated with. Available for Valkey, Redis OSS and Serverless Memcached only.

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user group.
